<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is captured either live (perf record running when we mmap) or in deferred</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mode, via /proc/PID/maps. The MMAP record is used as a marker of a jitdump</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// detect this special filename and process the jitdump file.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mapping must be PROT&#95;EXEC to ensure it is captured by perf record</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
